# Floating Wharves Construction and Installation Tender
### Reference: PW-22-01009072
### Solicitation: 30003515
#### *Publish Date:* October 4, 2022
#### *Tender Closing Date:* October 18, 2022, 13:00:00
---

Government of Canada: Fisheries and Oceans Canada 
### Location: Cribbon’s Pt., Antigonish County, Nova Scotia, Canada

### Description of Contract
Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to participate in a tender to design, construct, and install floating wharves at Cribbon’s Pt., Antigonish County, Nova Scotia.

### Scope of the Contract
The  requirements of the contract are as follows: 
- The Contractor must deliver all materials, equipment, labour and services for the construction and installation of floating wharves at Cribbon’s Pt. by April 28th, 2023.
- The Contractiting entity will evaluate bids for this project in two phases – qualification (Phase 1) and financial bid (Phase 2).

### expected criteria for evaluation of applicant qualifications:
 Contractors must meet the followings examination criteria.
- General Marine Construction Work experience 
- Construction Services Experience

### derivations:
A Bidders list and Tender list will be developed in phase 1 and based on another evaluation criteria - the financial bid will then invite Qualified contractors for invitation proposal.
